mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (USER_NO, ID, PW, NAME, GENDER, EMAIL, MOBILE, BIRTHYEAR, BIRTHDAY, POSTCODE, ROAD_ADDRESS, JIBUN_ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, EXTRA_ADDRESS, AGREE_CODE, SNS_TYPE, JOIN_DATE, PW_MODIFY_DATE, INFO_MODIFY_DATE, SESSION_ID, SESSION_LIMIT_DATE) VALUES (USERS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{mobile}, #{birthyear}, #{birthday}, #{postcode}, #{roadAddress}, #{jibunAddress}, #{detailAddress}, #{extraAddress}, #{agreeCode}, NULL, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, NULL, NULL)
INSERT INTO ACCESS_LOG (ACCESS_LOG_NO, ID, LAST_LOGIN_DATE) VALUES (ACCESS_LOG_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO RETIRE_USERS (USER_NO, ID, JOIN_DATE, RETIRE_DATE) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{id}, #{joinDate}, SYSDATE)
